other_tests.findings: Interval progression of elevated transplant kidney resistive indices; little if any diastolic flow identified in the transplant kidney; main renal artery peak systolic velocity increasing, 191 cm/s; no hydronephrosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The resistive indices are now approaching 1, indicating progression in findings.

other_tests.findings: Findings from previous surgical history; 2.5 x 1.5 cm rounded isoechoic mass in the liver.
